dataset.title: I share a dataset
dataset.description: Easily share your dataset in the dataverse
dataset.selectDescription: Select the dataset that you want to upload into the storage service.
dataset.knowFee: Fees set for the use of the dataset
dataset.summaryCertify: I certify that I do not share any personal metadata.

service.title: I share a service
service.description: Easily share your service in the dataverse

metadataFilling.stepDescription: Please complete the dataset metadata for reference purposes. It is highly discouraged to include personal data in the metadata due to its immutability once stored in the blockchain, which does not comply with GDPR regulations.
metadataFilling.creator: Creator
metadataFilling.enterDatasetFee: Enter the minimum fee applicable for the use of this dataset

completeTransaction.referenceDataset: to reference your dataset into the protocol

tooltip.gasFeeOnly: This fee consists only of gas fees.
tooltip.estimationNote: This is an estimation based on the current network conditions and the complexity of the transaction.
tooltip.gasFeePurpose: The gas fee ensures your transaction gets processed on the blockchain network.
tooltip.transactionDeclineCondition: If the actual gas fees required exceed the estimated amount, the transaction will be declined. Otherwise, it will be validated.
tooltip.exactGasFee: You will only be charged for the exact gas fees spent during the transaction.
tooltip.maxProcessingTime: Additionally, the maximum processing time for a new block is 10 seconds. Your transaction will be included in an available block based on the gas price you choose.
tooltip.chooseGasPriceCarefully: Make sure to review the gas price carefully to optimize transaction speed and costs.

completeTransaction.yourDatasetReferencingRequestHasBeenSent: Your dataset referencing request has been successfully sent to the dataverse! The network will now proceed with the block validation process.
